Mapping: <% if (isAddPluginProject == true) { %> <FileToFile map="PluginAssemblies\**\<%= visualStudioSolutionProjectPrefix %>XrmPlugins.dll" to="..\<%= visualStudioSolutionProjectPrefix %>.Xrm.Plugins\bin\**\<%= visualStudioSolutionProjectPrefix %>.Xrm.Plugins.dll" /> <% } %> <% if (isAddWorkflowProject == true) { %> <FileToFile map="PluginAssemblies\**\<%= visualStudioSolutionProjectPrefix %>XrmWorkflows.dll" to="..\<%= visualStudioSolutionProjectPrefix %>.Xrm.Workflows\bin\**\<%= visualStudioSolutionProjectPrefix %>.Xrm.Workflows.dll" /> <% } %>
